nodes.text: "Captain Threepio" is a comic short story that appears in Star Wars Tales 8. It was written and drawn by Ryan Kinnaird.

When a Rebel freighter carrying a cargo of droids on a secret mission is attacked by pirates, it is left to C-3PO, aided by a data module storing the combat experiences of Raymus Antilles, to take the helm and save the day. C-3PO activates all the droids as his crew. Using Nagnol gas as a cover, C-3PO pilots into an asteroid field were the pirates blindly crash into asteroids. In the end, C-3PO fails to recall the experience.
